duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead Human Resources initiatives within a designated territory and support all aspects of human resources management, including labor planning, employee retention, employee relations, benefits administration, performance management, compliance, and training and development.
Develop and implement HR strategies that align with the company's goals and objectives and work closely with company leadership and the executive team.
Oversee the West Region and report to VP of Human Resources.
Partner with managers to develop and execute long-term and short-term people strategies that directly support and enable business objectives.
Manage employee relations issues, including resolving conflicts and addressing complaints.
Implement performance management programs that align with the organization's goals and objectives.
Ensure compliance with all relevant labor laws and regulations.
Develop and implement training and development programs to enhance employee skills and knowledge.
Develop and maintain HR policies and procedures that are compliant with all relevant laws and regulations.
Provide guidance and support to managers and employees on HR-related matters.
Partner with managers to develop and embed an organizational culture that creates both an unmatched employee and customer experience.
Leverage change acceleration techniques to assist in driving broad change.
Partner with leaders and employees within the region to create a positive and serving work environment.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree in Human Resources or related discipline
